pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Monotone Conditional Error Functions // Design and analysis of confirmatory adaptive clinical trials using the optimal conditional error framework according to Brannath and Bauer (2004) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2004.00221.x. An extension to the optimal conditional error function using interim estimates as described in Brannath and Dreher (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2402.00814 and functions to ensure that the resulting conditional error function is non-increasing are also available.
